item.title: Grouping folders on Finder
item.description: If you are using Finder it is possible to group all the folders instead of have them separated by the 'name sort' effect by doing a little hack. Open finder and go (press Option+G to go directly) to /System/Library/Frameworks/ApplicationServices.framework/ Versions/A/Frameworks/LaunchServices.framework/Versions/ A/Resources/Spanish.lproj (text wrapped intentionally fo fit the page) and change Spanish.lproj by your used language.
